title: Malaysia maternal mortality ratio 2011 to 2018
yAxis: Maternal mortality ratio per hundred thousand live births
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Maternal mortality ratio per hundred thousand live births, with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2013.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2016.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2013 to 2011.
gold: The statistic represents the maternal mortality ratio in Malaysia from 2011 to 2018 . In 2018 , the maternal mortality ratio in Malaysia was approximately 23.5 maternal deaths per one hundred thousand live births .
